definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to test/to put to the test/trial/ordeal

chemical examination/to do a lab test

sentences.english: In any case, experience will ultimately be the teacher.
sentences.chinese: 兂論侞何，俓驗終將媞老師。

sentences.english: I have to take a drug test every six months just to make sure I'm clean.
sentences.chinese: 我必須每六個月驗一次尿以證明我沒吸毒。

sentences.english: If that's the case, you should take your pee to the doctor immediately.
sentences.chinese: 如果有這種人的話，他應該立刻去醫院驗驗尿纔對。

sentences.english: The importers have the right to re-inspect the goods after their arrival.
sentences.chinese: 進口商在貨到後有權對貨物進行復驗。

sentences.english: A representative sample should be taken for the purpose of performing a retest.
sentences.chinese: 應當取一個具有代表性的樣品進行復驗。

sentences.english: Pass the urine sample and examination form out of the window of the bathroom next door.
sentences.chinese: 驗尿檢體與檢驗單請於隔壁廁所窗口遞出即可。

sentences.english: Time tries friends as fire tries gold.
sentences.chinese: 時間驗朋友，烈火驗真金。

sentences.english: Time tries friends as fire tries gold.
sentences.chinese: 時間驗朋友，烈火驗真金。

sentences.english: This class is in the charge of an experienced teacher.
sentences.chinese: 這個班由一位經¬驗豐富的老師負責。
烏韋蘭格是一個48歲的驗船師。

sentences.english: Your surveyor should also advise you on the value of the boat.
sentences.chinese: 你的驗船師也應該給你關於船價值的建議。

sentences.english: I'm the surveyor from ZC Register of shipping .
sentences.chinese: 這是中國船驗局的驗船師。
